subject: Waterloop 1on1 Invitation
text:
Hello NAME,

Thank you for completing the written application. We enjoyed reading your responses, and would love to get to know you more through a short one-on-one.

If you are still interested in the position of POSITION, please go to this link and sign up for a time slot with the name _____. Please ensure you do this before <last day of your interview>.

Iâ€™m looking forward to talking to you soon!

subject: Waterloop Application
text:
Hello NAME,

Thank you for taking the time to complete the Waterloop application process. We enjoyed getting to know you better through your written application.

All applicants were assessed based upon their skill fit, enthusiasm and willingness to contribute to the team. Though you were a very impressive candidate, we regret to inform you that you have not been selected to be a member of Waterloop for the Winter 2022 term.

Thank you for investing so much time into applying for Waterloop. We hope that you will still continue to support Waterloop in the future.

subject: Waterloop Acceptance
text:
Hello NAME,

Congratulations! Thank you for completing the application process. We enjoyed getting to know you, and would love to onboard you onto Waterloop as a POSITION. 

Our New Members Orientation will be held virtually on Saturday, September 18th from 12: 00 PM - 4: 00 PM EST. You can join with this link. 

Please confirm that you are interested in taking the position by filling out this short form by September 17th, 11: 59PM. Upon completion, we will be providing you with more onboarding details and getting you set up with your very own @waterloop email! We look forward to working with you soon!

subject: Waterloop Application
text:
Hello NAME,

Thank you for taking the time to complete the Waterloop application process. We enjoyed getting to know you better throughout the application and 1:1.

All applicants were assessed based upon their enthusiasm and willingness to contribute and commit to the team. Though you were a very impressive candidate, we regret to inform you that you have not been selected to be a member of Waterloop for the Winter 2022 term.

Thank you for investing the time to apply for Waterloop. We hope that you will still continue to support Waterloop in the future.
